law.text: No person shall engage in the business of servicing or maintaining sewage pretreatment units, grease traps, or holding tanks, or the transporting of sewage sludge from those facilities within the Commonwealth of Kentucky without being licensed and bonded as hereinafter provided.
law.history: Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 248, sec. 4, effective July 14, 1992. -- Created 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 82, sec. 2.
